languages.text: Где-то на улицах Райкада бродит безумный защитник Человечества. Вероятно, еще возможно отыскать его кровавый след.

traits.locale_text: Где-то на улицах Райкада бродит безумный защитник Человечества. Вероятно, еще возможно отыскать его кровавый след.

languages.text: Somewhere in the streets of the capital of Rykad Minoris, a deranged defender of Humanity is wandering about. His trail of blood could likely still be picked up and followed.
languages.original_text: Где-то на улицах Райкада бродит безумный защитник Человечества. Вероятно, еще возможно отыскать его кровавый след.

traits.locale_text: Somewhere in the streets of Rykad, a deranged defender of Humanity is wandering about. His trail of blood can likely still be picked up and followed.
Somewhere in the streets of Rykad, a deranged defender of Humanity is wandering about. His trail of blood can likely still be picked up and followed.
Somewhere in the streets of Rykad, a deranged defender of Humanity is wandering about. His trail of blood could likely still be picked up and followed.
Somewhere in the streets of Rykad, a deranged defender of Humanity is wandering about. His trail of blood could likely still be picked up and followed.
Somewhere in the streets of the capital of Rykad Minoris, a deranged defender of Humanity is wandering about. His trail of blood could likely still be picked up and followed.
Somewhere in the streets of the capital of Rykad Minoris, a deranged defender of Humanity is wandering about. His trail of blood could likely still be picked up and followed.

languages.text: Irgendwo streift ein geisteskranker Verteidiger der Menschheit durch die Straßen der Hauptstadt von Rykad Minoris. Vermutlich könnte man seine blutige Spur noch immer aufnehmen.
languages.original_text: Somewhere in the streets of the capital of Rykad Minoris, a deranged defender of Humanity is wandering about. His trail of blood could likely still be picked up and followed.

traits.locale_text: Irgendwo streift ein geisteskranker Verteidiger der Menschheit durch die Straßen der Hauptstadt von Rykad Minoris. Vermutlich könnte man seine blutige Spur noch immer aufnehmen.

languages.text: Quelque part dans les rues de la capitale de Rykad Minoris erre un défenseur dément de l'humanité. Il devrait être possible de remonter le sillage de sang qu'il a laissé derrière lui.
languages.original_text: Somewhere in the streets of the capital of Rykad Minoris, a deranged defender of Humanity is wandering about. His trail of blood could likely still be picked up and followed.

traits.locale_text: Quelque part dans les rues de la capitale de Rykad Minoris erre un défenseur dément de l'humanité. Il devrait être possible de remonter le sillage de sang qu'il a laissé derrière lui.

languages.text: ライカド・ミノリスの首都惑星の街路のどこかを、精神の混乱した人類の味方がさまよい歩いている。今なら彼の血痕を見つけて、追跡することができそうだった。
languages.original_text: Somewhere in the streets of the capital of Rykad Minoris, a deranged defender of Humanity is wandering about. His trail of blood could likely still be picked up and followed.

traits.locale_text: ライカド・ミノリスの首都惑星の街路のどこかを、精神の混乱した人類の味方がさまよい歩いている。今なら彼の血痕を見つけて、追跡することができそうだった。

languages.text: Rykad Minoris'in başkent sokaklarında bir yerlerde, İnsanlığın sağı solu belli olmaz bir savunucusu dolaşıyor. Döktüğü kanın izlerini bulup adamın izini sürmek mümkün olabilir.
languages.original_text: Somewhere in the streets of the capital of Rykad Minoris, a deranged defender of Humanity is wandering about. His trail of blood could likely still be picked up and followed.

traits.locale_text: Rykad Minoris'in başkent sokaklarında bir yerlerde, İnsanlığın sağı solu belli olmaz bir savunucusu dolaşıyor. Döktüğü kanın izlerini bulup adamın izini sürmek mümkün olabilir.

languages.text: En algún lugar de las calles de la capital de Rykad Minoris, un defensor de la Humanidad descontrolado vaga. Es probable que puedas seguir el rastro de sangre que deja a su paso.
languages.original_text: Somewhere in the streets of the capital of Rykad Minoris, a deranged defender of Humanity is wandering about. His trail of blood could likely still be picked up and followed.

traits.locale_text: En algún lugar de las calles de la capital de Rykad Minoris, un defensor de la Humanidad descontrolado vaga. Es probable que puedas seguir el rastro de sangre que deja a su paso.

languages.text: 在小莱卡德的首都街道上，一位失去理智的人类捍卫者正在四处游荡。行商浪人或许可以沿着他留下的血迹，找到他的下落。
languages.original_text: Somewhere in the streets of the capital of Rykad Minoris, a deranged defender of Humanity is wandering about. His trail of blood could likely still be picked up and followed.

traits.locale_text: 在小莱卡德的首都街道上，一位失去理智的人类捍卫者正在四处游荡。行商浪人或许可以沿着他留下的血迹，找到他的下落。
